meanings.sent1: I counted up to thirty apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The classroom had exactly thirty students present.
meanings.sent3: It took thirty tries to get the puzzle right!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like thirty candles.
meanings.sent5: The clock struck twelve, marking the end of thirty minutes.

meanings.sent1: She bought thirty balloons for the party.
meanings.sent2: The store sold thirty books in just one hour.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased its tail in thirty circles.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed through the empty room like thirty whispers.
meanings.sent5: The garden bloomed with thirty colorful flowers.
